import sys


def main():
    q = int(input())

    for i in range(q):
        n, a, b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
        
        min_bottles = n//2
        min_cost = min_bottles * b + (n%2)*a
        if a > b:
            min_cost = min(min_cost, (n//2)*a + (n%2)*b)
        
        print(min_cost)

        if child != parent:
            dfs(child, node)
